timeline.message:
[KOGITO-1864] Adjust process-kafka-quickstart-springboot example for Kogito operator

Signed-off-by: Karel Suta <ksuta@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: this part is no more accurate ?
timeline.author: radtriste
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,18 +73,6 @@ This quickstart requires an Apache Kafka to be available and by default expects
 
 https://kafka.apache.org/quickstart
 
-In addition to that two topics are needed

replies.bodyText: No, topics are created automatically, user doesn't have to do anything.
replies.author: sutaakar
